p: The use value of the cited plants is given in Table 4. The plant species with more citations, indicated by relatively higher frequency indexes (FI), were said to have better use value than the ones with fewer citations or less FI. As such, Cannabis sativa L. , Steganotaenia araliacea Hochst., Heteromorpha trifoliata (Wendl.)Eckl. & Zeyh., Kigelia africana (Lam.) Benth.., Bulbinella floribunda (Thunb.) T.Durand. & Schinz., Solanum incanum L., Pseudolachnostylis maprounelifolia Pax [Agg]. and Burkea africana Hook., with more than one citation, had more use-value than the others in this study.
